channel.title: Comments on: The Verve “Love Is Noise” video

item.title: By: Deyan
item.dc:creator: Deyan
item.description: The lay is a psychidelic anthem. The damsel in it is a Junoesque apparition. Anent the lyrics--- thy does not matter, music is what makes music.
item.content:encoded: The lay is a psychidelic anthem. The damsel in it is a Junoesque apparition. Anent the lyrics— thy does not matter, music is what makes music.
